index.title: Home
index.description: This is the startpage and also a little link-collection. It is using your webstorage to provide this site also offline when supported by your browser. Out of this, there's a 'Refresh'-button.

tryToxic.title: tryToxic
tryToxic.preword: tryToxic is just another tox-api-client, written in python 3 and pyQt

features.Local encryption: Store messages and idendity encrypted on harddisk

jobManagement.title: jobManagement
jobManagement.preword: Semantic job-overview when you work diffrent companys (freelance/temporary worker). Written in python3 using pyQt and pyCrypto.

features.Local encryption: Store messages and idendity encrypted on harddisk
features.Diffrent companys: When you work for diffrent companys

peta.title: peta
peta.preword: The name Peta came out of PHPMeta. Itâ€™s basicly written in PHP with the use of smarty (template/.tpl-files) and dojo (Javascript). The idea behind this project is to avoid redundant rewrites. A maingoal is a good structure, where the administrator of a system could change things as he need. It's target is a base for everything.

features.Flexible pluginsystem: Every plugin could have one to n instances
features.Flexible accesssystem: Every user have one to n roles. Every instanced plugin has one to n roles with a r/rw/admin-right.
features.MVC-Structure: It's easy to learn the code or write a plugin

bugs.Update accessrights: Set ar fails on update, so rm ant touch!
